segments.text: They don't really think you took it , do they ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know . I just know I've never been asked so many questions in my life .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How many of them were there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Three-but there was one of them who kept asking really stupid questions .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , he wanted to know what time I got up this morning and if I bad a bath or a shower you know , things like that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What on earth has that got to do with some money disappearing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've no idea . Oh yes , and the most ridiculous thing . He asked me what I had for breakfast this morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh well , that's it . They obviously think you're a desperate criminal and you have to steal to eat . I should think you'll get thirty years .
segments.speaker: S1
